title: Spilling our Juice with Solomon Georgio
itunes:title: Spilling our Juice with Solomon Georgio
description:
This week, we’re talking about game changers and game changers only. Items in the realm of DrTung's Ionic Toothbrush and the elusive Lumi Toilet Brush. Plus, there is no small talk with comedian, actor, and writer Solomon Georgio. No no, we go straight into deep, dark secrets as he tells us not only about his own game changer, but his new podcast, the Juice.


Please note, Add To Cart contains mature themes and may not be appropriate for all listeners. 

 

To see all products mentioned in this episode, head to @addtocartpod on Instagram. To purchase any of the products, see below. 

 

  • Check out Solomon Georgio’s hot goss podcast, The Juice!
  • Solomon’s game changer is slugging!
  • Kulap has two game changers this week. Her first is playing pickleball and the second is the Splitwise App!
  • SuChin’s game changers are Jenny Patinkin Luxury Vegan Makeup Brush Soap and this UV light sanitizer

 

Stay up to date with us on Twitter, Facebook, and Instagram at @LemonadaMedia. 

 

Joining Lemonada Premium is a great way to support our show and get bonus content. Subscribe today at bit.ly/lemonadapremium. 

 

Click this link for a list of current sponsors and discount codes for this show and all Lemonada shows: lemonadamedia.com/sponsors

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
